thread.section_title: Ham Yard Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service Excellence
thread.title_full: Service Excellence - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ian m
title: Service Excellence
text: Really good afternoon tea at a very reasonable price for the high quality food and drink. What takes this into the super league is the perfect service. Result: an outstanding experience. Very pro-active, no fuss, no "false customer service behaviour." Every aspect of the service experience was perfect, perfectly delivered at exactly the right time in exactly the right way. The only thing we had to ask for was the bill. And it was a pleasure to pay it.
